document_data.name: Grabert
document_data.mainbody: '''Grabert''' was a soldier in the [[Golden Legion]] around [[1361 DR]].
document_data.History: Grabert was a veteran swordsman of the Legion. He was part of [[Daggrande]]'s squad in [[Payit]] when they first fought against the [[Maztican]]s. He was injured in the battle and later made his report to [[Cordell]] and his command staff.
